The video circulating on 14 November 201: in which a woman claimed that suspicious aircraft or crop dusters were observed "spraying chemical agents" in an "act of chemical warfare against the indigenous people of Standing Rock."
Standing Rock spokesperson Dallas Goldto: s denial of the claim in a social media post on 1 December 2016, where he specifically stated, "No we are not being sprayed with chemicals."
